summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Learning Path feature. Fixed 1 critical bug: VideoLearningModal not rendering in roadmap phase. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing passed for onboarding flow, skill tree, Add Topic, Add URL, YouTube videos, and Video Learning Modal with AI companion.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/health - 200 OK
Backend: /api/learning/youtube/preview/{video_id} - Returns video metadata (title, author, thumbnail)
Backend: /api/learning/onboard - Creates personalized learning paths for software, data, business industries
Backend: /api/learning/research-resources - Returns YouTube playlists and free courses
Backend: /api/learning/paths/create - Creates custom learning paths
Backend: /api/learning/paths - Returns all custom learning paths
Backend: /api/learning/paths/{path_id} - Returns specific learning path
Backend: /api/learning/paths/{path_id}/topics - Adds topics with YouTube URLs
Backend: /api/learning/topics/{topic_id} PUT - Updates topic name, status, youtube_url
Backend: /api/learning/topics/{topic_id} DELETE - Deletes topics
Backend: /api/learning/video-qa - Returns AI answers about video content
Backend: /api/learning/video/contextual-help - Returns contextual help for video sections
Backend: /api/learning/video/comprehension-check - Generates quiz questions
Frontend: Learning Path onboarding wizard (4 steps) works correctly
Frontend: Industry selection (6 industries) works correctly
Frontend: Learning Roadmap displays with progress tracking (0 of 24 topics)
Frontend: Free Learning Resources section shows YouTube Videos & Tutorials
Frontend: YouTube video links are clickable with Play buttons
Frontend: Learning Topics (Skill Tree) displays with expandable tree structure
Frontend: Add Topic button opens form with topic name and YouTube URL fields
Frontend: Add URL button appears on topics without videos
Frontend: Video Learning Modal opens when clicking Play button
Frontend: Video Learning Modal shows AI Learning Companion panel
Frontend: Video Learning Modal has Explain This, Example, Go Deeper, Quiz Me buttons
Frontend: Weekly plan displays with tasks and homework
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix for custom learning paths
context_for_next_testing_agent: Learning Path feature is fully functional. Fixed bug where VideoLearningModal was not rendering in roadmap phase - added modal rendering inside the roadmap phase return statement. All APIs working: YouTube preview, onboarding, research resources, custom learning paths CRUD, video Q&A, contextual help, comprehension checks. Frontend shows onboarding wizard, skill tree with Add Topic/Add URL, YouTube videos with Play buttons, and Video Learning Modal with AI companion.

bug_fixed.issue: VideoLearningModal not rendering when phase === 'roadmap' - modal was only rendered in learning phase
bug_fixed.fix: Wrapped RoadmapPhase return with React Fragment and added VideoLearningModal rendering at roadmap phase level

onboarding_flow.details: 4-step wizard: Goal (industry selection), Background, Learning Style, Commitment. AI generates personalized learning path in 12-15 seconds.

youtube_preview_api.details: GET /api/learning/youtube/preview/{video_id} returns title, author_name, thumbnail_url, embed_url

learning_onboard_api.details: POST /api/learning/onboard returns profile, skill_tree, weekly_plan, progress

research_resources_api.details: POST /api/learning/research-resources returns youtube_playlists and free_courses arrays

skill_tree.details: Displays 4-5 topics with expandable tree structure, Add Topic button visible

add_topic_button.details: Opens form with topic name and YouTube URL (optional) fields

add_url_button.details: Appears on topics without videos, opens Add YouTube Video form

youtube_videos_section.details: Free Learning Resources section shows 4-5 YouTube videos with Play buttons and external links

video_learning_modal.details: Opens with YouTube embed, AI Learning Companion panel, Explain This/Example/Go Deeper/Quiz Me buttons, chat input
